titles.title: Cleanse Thou My Heart, O God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Cleanse Thou my heart, oh God,
For Thou alone art able,
To deliver me,
From all despair,
Save me for Thy great name's sake.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
CHORUS
Grace, grace, I cry to Thee.
Grace, shout grace to the Lord.
Save me for Thy mercy's sake.
Encompass me, oh Holy One,
With Thy songs of deliverance.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Make haste to deliver me,
According to Thy word, oh God,
Purge away my sins,
For Thy mercy is good,
Be pleased, oh Lord, to deliver me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Teach Thou my heart to fear,
For Thou alone art able,
To draw me near,
To Thy throne of grace,
To deliver me for
Thy great name's sake.
